name: Equidity
overview:
Equidity is an exclusive network of carefully selected, growth-investor QIBs and , top pre-IPO companies that identifies top investment opportunities, facilitates relationship building, and provides secure access to private company data in the most time- and cost-efficient manner possible. Equidity is an IRMâ„¢ utility (Investor Relationship Management) and does not charge companies transaction fees.

Equidity facilitates interactions between investor members and pre-IPO companies through unique, transaction-focused conferences that are exclusive, invitation-only events. Our online interactive platform enables confidential information sharing needed for research and analysis, and is supported by customized advisory that includes investor meetings, virtual roadshows, and other IRMâ„¢ services.

Equidity’s goal is to remedy the liquidity and IPO crises by creating a direct relationships between top investors & companies to facilitate long-term growth investing & fundamentals-based valuations.
